summary: An Ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 39381, entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East 80th Street, from 15th Avenue Northeast to 19th Avenue Northeast; 16th Avenue Northeast and 17th Avenue Northeast, each from Each 80th Street to East 85th Street; 18th Avenue Northeast and 19th Avenue Northeast, each from East 80th Street to approximately 170 feet south of the south margin of East 85th Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5928 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", passed on the 21st day of April, 1919, approved on the 22nd day of April, 1919.
